The real story is about Slyvia Likens. The "aunt" is actually Gertrude Baniszewski. as previously stated, watch "An American Crime" for the actual story. Although much is still left out. No names are changed to protect the guilty.

Search Slyvia Likens & Gertrude on wikipedia for the whole account. It's much worse than this movie could portray.

Slyvia Marie Likens (01/03/49-10/26/65) R.I.P.

Thanks to everyone who ran their yap about the film content or for some reason the book it was based on while not mentioning at all the quality of the torrent.

Great movie depicting a simply horrible event. Then again, the movie doesn't even come close to the atrocities Sylvia had to endure; here's a few:

- forced to beat her own sister
- having scalding water and salt rubbed into wounds
- forced to eat her own feces

Sylvia eventually died during an ordeal after being bludgeoned; she suffered a brain hemorrhage and died on October 26th 1965. A truly sad story.

Anyways, to comment on the video itself.

The quality is quite good. It's certainly not HD but, I wouldn't put it any worse than standard definition. I played it on a 46" TV and had little to no concerns or issues. Good sound too.

If the uploader ever comes back and see this, I say thank you.
